attributes.action: Recognise animals as sentient beings that can feel pain. Put EU law into UK law.
attributes.additional_details: I was shocked and appalled to see our MP's vote against putting this EU legislation in UK law.  I don't believe MP's represented the will of the British people and would like this to be debated again.
attributes.background: Animals feel pain.  They feel emotions, and have feelings.  We need this EU law recognised in UK law.  We are a nation of animal lovers, so why wouldn't we want the best animal welfare in the world.
